definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: He praised the Comoran soldiers and thanked the African Union and the countries that supported the operation.
sentences.chinese: 他稱讚科摩羅士兵，並感謝支持這次行動的非洲聯軍。

sentences.english: The Comorian franc is the official currency of the island nation of Comoros.
sentences.chinese: 科摩羅法郎是島國科摩羅的官方貨幣。

sentences.english: The Comorian franc is the official currency of the island nation of Comoros.
sentences.chinese: 科摩羅法郎是島國科摩羅的官方貨幣。

sentences.english: The girl was taken to a hospital in capital of the Comoros, Moroni.
sentences.chinese: 隨後女孩被送往科摩羅首都莫羅尼的一家醫院。
